choices: Male
Female
1.content: Are you male or female?
1.title: The beginning

choices: You are inside a giant house
You are in a large park
You are in a middle of a huge beach (Reserved)
You are on a strange land (You're on top of a giant Pokemon anthro's body)
Other choices
11.content: After a long goodnight sleep, you finally woken up from your slumber and opened your eyes. After you opened them, you expected to see your room, but however, you found yourself in an unfamiliar area that you never seen before.
11.title: Male

choices: ...a family of the Gardevoir evolution line
...two roomates featuring a Lilligant and a Roserade
...a lone Pokemon anthro (Reader's choice)
111.content:
You look around to find yourself on a large table in the middle of a large living room of some sort. You were shocked to see your new location as you were nothing more than a tiny insect. "Why is everything so freakishly huge? What if someone around here mistaken me for a bug?" you said frantically as you spotted something. You noticed a giant photo on the table; it must be a picture of who ever owns the this home. You walked toward the photo album while at the same time looked around some more of this strange world.

Afterwards, you reached the giant album which towered over you. After a close look of it, you were shock to see that the photo contains a picture of...
111.title: You are inside a giant house

choices: You hear nothing
You hear something
Reader's choice
1111.content:
"I don''t believe this..."

The photo you are looking at is a family but not just any type of family. This photo features a family of five Pokemon which are a Gallade father, a Gardevoir mother, an older teen Gardevoir girl, a preteen Kirlia girl, and a Ralts boy. When looking closely, you noticed that they all look much more human-like than you think; they even wore clothes just like actual people! Are you in a world were giant Pokemon anthros rule? Or maybe you're still dreaming. You shook your head several times to wake yourself up from this so-called "dream" but after several times (few of which are slightly painful), you were still right here; inside the giant home of a family of giant psychic-type Pokemon.

Okay, so you are not in your world anymore and you are already unprepared for this situation. Should you contact any of these giant? You don't know if either one of them is friendly or not so perhaps you should avoid their sight at the moment.

Looking around the room, you noticed that everything is quiet around here. Are they home or are they asleep right now? You hide behind the giant family photo and stand there; waiting for any noise to see if you are all alone.
1111.title: One Big Family

choices: Go to the kitchen
Go upstairs to one of their rooms
Go to the outside world
11111.content:
After standing here for about ten minutes, you noticed that the entire house was very quiet and no single sound was ever heard. This could mean that either nobody is home or maybe they're still asleep in their rooms. So with that, you walk out of the giant photo and sit on the table; thinking of what to do next.

You look to the right and see what looks like the kitchen. Kinda think of it, you were getting somewhat hungry so maybe you could go there and try to get something to eat. However if you truly not alone here, you could risk getting spotted by one of them and believing you're a pest, tries to get rid of you.

You look at the stairs ahead and think about trying to get to one of their rooms in order to see if you are the only one in this household. If they were there, you could maybe get a close look at them.

You see the front door at the left and even though it's extremely dangerous, you could go and escape to the outside world to find at least somewhere safer to survive in this strange world.

What do you do next?
11111.title: All Alone (Or Are You?)

choices: Get to the berries
Go outside (Reserved)
Someone comes into the kitchen
111111.content:
As much as you don't want to be seen as a pest, you decided to go to the kitchen and get something to eat. You make your way to the edge of the table, climb down the leg, and finally land on the floor. You ran to the kitchen to find anything to eat there.

Once you made there, you first look around the place and found out that it looks exactly like a normal kitchen from your world; everything's very identical. There was a refrigerator, a microwave, a stove, cupboards, a dinning table, and many more. Being in such a normal room, you feel like a small scavanging insect around here.

Fortunately, you found something to eat around here: a plate of berries. Unfortunately, it is high up above the shelf so it would take a long time to climb up there. (plus you don't know if it was climbable.)

At the end of the kitchen, you see a glass door that leads outside as you can see the backyard. You weren't that hungry anyways so you could just go there and take a look around.

What happens next?
111111.title: Go to the kitchen

choices: ...the Lilligant girl
...the Rossrade girl
...both of them
1112.content:
These two all looked like....pokemon?! These were known as Lilligant and Roserade, but something seemed a little of these plant creatures. First of all, they seemed look alot more humanoid than what you can imagine; they even wore clothes just like humans! "I never knew these type of pokemon existed. Unless, are there more anthros like these in this world?" You thought to yourself.

Just then, you heard the sound of a door knob. They must be home right now! You quick hide behind the photo album and looked at the door.

The door opened and came in...
1112.title: The home of the two plant women

choices: Go upstairs
Go to the basement
Hide and seek shelter from them
11123.content:
"That's how what I'm going to do to that bitch." yelled Riley the Roserade in fury as she and her best friend Megan the Lilligant soon arrived to their house.

"I know you gals have this ongoing rivalry between each other, but I don't think violence isn't the answers." said Megan, the more mindful of the two.

"Didn't you see what Cindy did? She just dropped my newly-brought clothes to the ground. I swear, that was definitely no accident." said Riley and showed her friend the clothes she got during their trip at the mall. "Now I have to clean and wash them all thanks to her."

Cindy is a classmate of the two who was also the archrival of Riley back at college. She was very popular and highly attractive Tsareena, but she was also very snobbish and doesn't seem to show any respect for anyone of lower status including Riley herself. Megan wonders if they could ever get along with each other.

As Megan parked the car, Riley got out of it and said "You just wait and see Megan, she will soon regret ever making me look like a fool." Megan shook her head in exasperation as she got out as well with her own shopping bags in her hands; perhaps that will take a long while for that to happen.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

You watch as the door flings open and saw the two giants walking inside. These giants were exactly the same ones you saw in the photo; one is an anthropomorphic Lilligant and another is an anthropomorphic Roserade. You mouth was wide open due to the fact that they were both look very humanoid and very gigantic to you.

The Lilligant girl wears a bright yellow dress tied up by a brown belt with a golden buckle and a pair of black sandals. Unlike normal Lilligants, she does not have a bud-like "dress" so you could see her white legs and yellow feet. She also has white arms with large leaves growing from on each elbows.

The Roserade girl wears a red tank top, a blue miniskirt, and a pair of black boots. She was very different from actual Roserades as she doesn't have a cape behind her and two roses are now growing on top of her hands.

You notice that they were both carrying shopping bags; they must of come home from doing shopping. The Lilligant girl heads upstairs while the Roserade girl goes to the door below the staircase which presumably leads to the basement as you noticed how dark the room looked.

So what do you do now? Should you go after one of them or just decided to hide from both of them?
11123.title: Megan And Riley

choices: Be bold and crawl into the same pot the Lilligant's sleeping in
Hide behind the dresser
Hide in the wide flower bed
111231.content:
Staying down here was too risky: The room is too far too spacious for your tastes, so it might be prudent to seek out an alternative instead.
You scan the room and find several exits, a door leading into what must be the kitchen, possibly the front door to their domicile, and a set of stairs leading up partially hidden out of view.
The stairs seem particularly interesting, as that might lead to where they sleep and thus won't be frequented very much by them during the day. The weird looking Lilligant was going to be up there as well so you;d have to stay on your guard.
Being very careful not to make too much noise, you climb down from the media center and scurry along the walls to your destination.
The stairs look imposing at first, until you realize that there's a long woven mat covering them that should pretty easy for you to climb.
When you finally reach the top you hear a rustling noise coming from a lit room down the dark hallway, and creep closer to investigate.
You find what must be the bedroom, except instead of any actual beds, the room is occupied by a wide wooden planter and a huge flowerpot, of which you can see the Lilligant slowly lowering herself into with a sigh.The rest of the room looks normally furnished with a TV hanging from the wall and a dual set of dresser drawers sitting up against the wall.
You guess ir all made sense. A plant needs only warmth, sunlight, water and soil to survive and it seems to be no different for these plant type Pokemon.
The Lilligant tiredly yawns, then uses her arms to partially bury her bottom half in soil. The petals on he head close and soon her eyes do as well.

Now, where to hide? The room has several nooks and crannies to exploit
111231.title: Into the bedroom

choices: The next day
Something happens during the night
1112311.content:
What better place to hide than right underneath their nose?
Lilligants technically don't have noses but whatever, your point still stands.
You run up near the pot and stop, gazing upwards in awe at the sheer size of the thing.
Thankfully it wasn't one of those pots with an overhanging lip, which would make it impossible to climb into, rather, it was a semi-conical shape with a little bit sticking out near the top. A little bit harder to traverse, but not impossible.
You crack your knuckles together and approach the ceramic vase and start looking for handholds...

You're exhausted, sore, and out of breath when you reach the top, but feel a rush of relief when the admittedly beautiful plant Pokemon finally comes into view.
You crawl and drop over the inner edge of the flower pot and into the soft soil.
The Lilligant's bottom half is completely submerged, leaving only the top of her belly and her chest exposed.
You tiredly walk up close to the plant Pokemon and nestle yourself right in between her breasts and snuggle close to her for warmth.
The combination of exhaustion and the warmth of the Pokemon forces your eyelids down, and you enter into a deep, dreamless sleep.
1112311.title: Be bold and crawl into the same pot the Lilliga...

choices: Leave the room and explore the house
Poke around the Lilligant's body while she sleep (Reserved)
The Lilligant girl suddenly wakes up as well before you can decide
11123111.content:
You woke up after a goodnight sleep and look around. You thought that you will finally be in your own world again, but you were still here. "I don't even how I even got here in the first place." You thought. You look at the window and saw that it was slightly dark; it must be getting close to morning. Looking up at the Lilligant girl, you see that she's still asleep.

You stretched your arms and think about what to do now. You think about getting out of the pot-like bed and go walk around the house while you can. You look at the still sleeping Pokegirl and wonder if you could try observing her body, maybe....you could have some fun while you can.

What do you want to do next?
11123111.title: Almost Morning

choices: You made it without any problems
One of giantesses goes to the living room
You found an even better hiding spot and go there instead
111233.content:
You soon start to have some second thoughts just as you were thinking about getting the attention of either one of these giant ladies. First of all, you might be living in a world of giant Pokemon anthros like these so if you (a tiny human) ended up getting found by them, things could get rather thorny. They'll be shocked to see a creature they never seen before and you'll just get nothing but questions and disbelief in return. With that, it's probably for the best to stay like this....plus you can't help but have something else slowly coming into your head, but shook it off and stay careful.

So far so good, the Pokegirls are currently in the other rooms doing something else; leaving you alone in the living room once again. You search the room to find a spot to seek shelter in this odd world. Looking down below the floor, you scan your eyes forward and across it until you spot a very small hole that was briefly behind the large television set. You wonder if that'll make a nice hiding spot for you because it was small enough to be unnoticeable to the giantesses but by the looks of it, it might be a little cramped up in there.

"Uncomfortable or not, it's still alot better than just standing here." you said and made your way towards it. As you reach the edge of the table, you realized that you need to carefully climb down to the floor; making sure you don't fall and hurt yourself. You move to one of the table legs on your right and slowly attempt to climb down. You try your very best not to look down and end up taking a crap in your pants after looking at far below the ground looks and since there are no pants around here (at least one that is your size), you don't not want to spend your days in this world with a pair of pants full of doo-doo.

Your feet soon reach the solid ground and release your grip off the leg. You look at the small hole which will soon be your shelter in this house. The hole was behind a large DVD player with two stereo speakers next to it and behind them were a serious of wires. "I could still it.." you said "If I could survive climbing down, I could survive this too."

You make a dash to the giant television set and towards the hole.
111233.title: Hiding From Sight

choices: You slept until sometime later
You slept until the middle of the night
You quickly woke up and find something to entertain yourself
1112331.content:
It was a long road ahead, but you finally made it. You stop and stood there in order to hear if one of them is coming to the room, but it was still quiet. Whether the two were doing is taking lots of time in the rooms, are they working on something?

You go and climb the edge of the TV stand which holds the DVD player. Looking at it, you can't help but find the DVD player look pretty cool. It was blue and has an advanced design with some lights across it. You'll love to ask one of the Pokegirls if you could use it, but maybe only if you somehow got to their size.

You move pass the DVD player and make a leap to the cords behind it. Grabbing it tightly (as it was kinda slippery), you slowly climb down to reach the hole. It was just the right size for you to hide in so you carefully aim your jump and leap right inside the depression.

Within the wall, you landed on the hard ground with thud but you weren't hurt. You got up and realized that it was a bit dark in here, but you still see just fine. Outside, you can hear the giantesses finally coming into the living room. You were relied that you made here before either one of them come.

From your viewpoint, all you could see were two pairs of legs walking across the room. The girls started to have a small conversation with each other. It wasn't that important, it was just a talk about college and someone named Cindy. However, you later learned that their names were Megan (the Lilligant girl) and Ridley (the Roserade girl). You later lose interest on their talk and sat down on the ground.

Feeling bored, you take a quick nap.
1112331.title: Sweet Shelter

choices: Go see the girls
Go inside the purse
Go back to your hiding spot
11123312.content:
"Wow, how long did I sept for?" That was your reaction when you woke up because everything was now dark; very dark. It was probably the middle of the night by now too because everything was now quiet in the house. Inside your hiding spot, you could barely see your own hand in the dark, but you at least see the exit. With the Pokegirls now asleep, it was now safe to look around the house for a bit.

You climb up to the hole and jump out of your hiding spot. You run right through the cords of the TV and stop right at the edge of the TV stand to look ahead.

Within the darkness, you saw the horizon of the table; the spot where you woke up from and the spot where you first began your adventure here in this world. You just hope that you'll find a way to get back to your world as much as possible.

With the girls asleep, you thought about going to their rooms and get a close look at them while they sleep. However, you don't know if you could make it there on time. You soon spot something next to the table and looking closer, you noticed that it's a purse that belonged to one of the girls. You were kinda curious on what kinds of stuff does it carry so maybe you could try to find out yourself.

What do you want to do?
11123312.title: Night Time

choices: You keep crawling her pajamas
She takes them off to put something new on
Readers Choice
111233121.content:
You decide to check out the girls. You don’t know why but you go check Ridley. You take a adventure going across their house and then you stumble upon a open door with a bed..

You keep going surprised at yourself for your stamina! You climb up the sheets to meet feet.. they look that of Ridleys feet.

You go up to them and you wonder what to do.. it would n o t be a good idea to wake her up to a small strange creature by her feet.

So you decide to climb up and kinda crawl over her wondering what to do. Then you see her fidget? Did you do something wrong? Then you look at her clock.. 7:34!?

You try to think of a hiding place quick but you think. Hide under her pajamas! You sprint to the bottom luckily you were close!

You dig in and go under praying that she woulden’t feel you. What will happen?
111233121.title: Go see the girls

choices: You woke up to see that you were tagging alongside with the girls to college
You were spotted by one of the girls when she was looking inside her purse
The iphone ranged waking both you and the girls during the night
111233122.content:
As much as you like to check on the girls, you thought that will take longer to get there plus it's little risky to get too close. Looking at the purse that was leaning next to the leg of the table, you not a nosy person, but you do wonder what kind of stuff does this world have. You jump down from the edge of the TV stand and make a run for the handbag.

You made it to the giant purse and take a good look at it now that you can see it clearly by this point. It was red in color and it appears to be at least medium-sized to the giant Poke-anthros' viewpoint. There were two pockets on each side and each of the pockets were white in color. You look up and first thought about climbing, but you have a better idea (and it's risky too).

You walk behind the purse and gave it a push. After seeing it not budge a bit, you push it even harder. It took about a minute or so until you finally manage to tip the purse over. This was easier than climbing it, but it'll cause one of the giantesses to discover the purse laying on it's side and wonder how it happened; you hope that they'll just shrug it off.

You grab the zipper and unzip the purse. You made a gap that was both small enough for you to enter and be less seen from their eyes and you crawl inside.

Inside, it was just as dark as your hiding spot so all you could see where some shadowy shapes, but you can still take some guesses of what they are.

All of the stuff you see around here are usually cosmetic stuff like lipsticks, nail polish and stuff. At the corner, you see a large iphone that towered over you. "Wow, they have so much in common with us humans." You said impressed by all stuff around you.

You walk behind the iphone and lay down on the smooth surface of the purse. You have enough looking around for the day so you closed your eyes and sleep for the reminder of the night.

What happens next?
111233122.title: Inside The Purse

choices: They went to class
They saw Cindy standing there
You got out of Riley's purse once they got there
1112331221.content:
After a goodnight sleep, you woke up to start your day. However, that's not the only reason you woke up as your entire surroundings is slightly vibrating from what appears to be coming from outside the purse. You went and climb your way towards the exit; using the giant objects as a ladder.

When you got there, you realized that the girls have woken up first before you could and already driving to who knows where. You look up to see Riley the Roserade above you and discovered that this purse belongs to her. You look ahead to see Megan the Lilligant driving the car while Riley is sitting next to her.

There's really nothing to do at the moment since you're currently inside a car. You could try to walk around here, but that's too risky so all you have to do is just stay here for the time being.

-------------------------------------------------

As Megan drives the car, she looks at her friend sitting next to her. Riley had a slight scowl on her face and Megan already knew that she was thinking about what she wanted to do once they get there. "Don't worry about her, Riley." said Megan "Trying to go up against her will just make the problem worse."

"C'mon Megan, I just know Cindy is just standing in front of the school, just waiting for us to arrive in order to mock us again." said Riley.

"I'm pretty sure Cindy has better things to do like going to class rather than waste her time with us." said Megan.

"She's in the same class as we are, even then she's just unavoidable. I'll just teach her a lesson she'll never forget." said Riley while raising her fists in the air.

Megan shook her head, by the time she try to hurt Cindy, she'll grab and drag her away from her as much as possible.

The grass-type pokegirls have finally to college after some bit of time. They got out of the car and make their way there.

What happens next?
1112331221.title: College Time

choices: You climb down and go towards the Tsareena girl
You stay here as the two girls leave from the other one
Riley suddenly attacks the girl
11123312212.content:
Riley scowls when she saw the last thing she didn't want to see when she comes here; her archnemesis Cindy. Megan looks with a worried expression as she knew what's going to happen next. Cindy just stood there with hands on her hips and a smirking expression on her face. "What do you want, Cindy?" asked Riley in an irritated tone "Are you here to mock us yet again?"

"Nah, I'm just standing here and enjoying the morning breeze around me." said Cindy as she puts both of her hands behind her head. "What brings you two homely gals around here?"

Riley's anger was slowly raising after hearing her insult. "Where're here for college of course, now why don't you get out of our way before you lose that pretty face of yours." She shows Cindy her fist as a warning to her if she doesn't do what she said, but Cindy just laugh to herself.

"Your treats don't scare me, Riley." said Cindy "In fact, I'm not scared of unattractive ladies like yourself.

"I'm warning you, Cindy" hissed Riley "Go away or ELSE!"

"I see you're still angry about that incident back at the mall since yesterday." laughed Cindy while putting her hand over her mouth "Let's be honest hon, those outfits deserve real beauties like myself." She does a seductive pose while she boosted herself and furthers mocked Riley for her inferiority.

Megan watches as Riley was already on the urge of exploding; she was ready to stop this conversation before it gets ugly.

-------------------------------------

While all of this is going, you climbed back up and outside the purse yet again after you keep hearing the voices of the girls plus a new one; it seems to be a conversation going on outside. After you got there, your jaw immediately drop from the moment you saw the new girl you haven't seen yet, and boy is she is the most gorgeous being you ever layed eyes upon.

She is a giant anthromorphic Tsareena lady that looks very much like the Pokemon she is based off of but just like the other two, she was more humanoid in shape and wears clothes like them plus she doesn't have the white puffy "skirt " that normal Tsareenas have.

Her attire is....er very revealing to say the least as she doesn't seem to have any shame showing all of her glory. She wears a small magenta tube top that exposes nearly the rest of her lower torso, an incredibly short brown jean shorts that is tied by a black belt with a grey buckle which reveals her long slender legs, and a pair of white high-heeled platform sandals. Combining all of that with her very sexy body made herself look hot in your eyes.

All you did was sit there and stare at the giant beauty ahead; how you wanted to get close to her.

What happens next?
11123312212.title: Cindy Is Here

choices: Bite into the Tsareena's heel and burrow inside (Reserved)
Climb onto the shoe and hitch a ride with her
111233122121.content:
Despite the abrasive attitude of the regal newcomer and her antagonism towards your "hosts" you couldn't help but be enchanted by her beauty. You stared at her, utterly transfixed, jaw slowly dropping at the magnificence of her angelic form.
You have to get closer. You can't let this opportunity like this just pass you by.
While Cindy was distracted, you climbed down from your lofty perch, completely unnoticed by the fuming Riley or the increasingly worried Megan. Luckily, it was not so great a drop that you would be seriously injured, in fact the Lilligant was holding the purse in both hands low to the ground so all it took was a short hop and you were free to move around.
The situation was looking tense, the petals on the Roserade's wrists vibrated rapidly as her fists shook in pure unadulterated rage. If looks could kill, the offending mangosteen would be nothing but a smoldering pile of ash.
Through clenched teeth she forced out, "Leave... us... alone... or I'll..."
Cindy seemed completely unperturbed by this display, and the smug look she wore never once wavered.
She tauntingly flipped her hair-like sepals over her shoulder and regarded the two with a nasty sneer.
"Are you losers going to make a move or what? I've got classes to go to and you're standing in my way."
Megan finally worked up the nerve to say something and laid a mollifying hand on her friend's shoulder, "Cmon Riley, if you two fight here you'll only be showing her she can get to you. Fighting her now will cause nothing but trouble for us later. Let's just leave while we still have some dignity left."
Riley turned her head towards her friend and harshly whispered, "We can't keep letting her get away with this! If we back off now the only thing we'll be doing is showing that we're willing to allow her to continue walking all over us. We have to make a stand right here and now.."
"Ir's just not worth it," Megan hurriedly whispered back, "If you two get caught in a physical altercation right here in front of Arceus and everyone you'll get yourself expelled and possibly even assault charges on your record. How are you going to explain to your parents that you got thrown out of school for fighting?."
Riley carefully considered her best friends words, turning them over in her mind.
On the one hand Megan was totally correct, if she got caught assaulting another student she would likely have her scholarship revoked and face possible jail time for the deed. Walking away and allowing her this one victory would be the smart thing to do.
Still, it would so worth it to see the shocked look on Cindy's face as she popped her right in her pretty little jaw.
"Um, hello? I believe I just asked you two a question? I don't have all day," the bored Tsareena called out.
Sighing heavily, Riley lowered her fists to her sides and stepped aside, allowing Cindy to pass.


-------------------------

You, of course, were ignoring all of this as you made your way across the concrete landscape to the base of the Tsareena's heel. The scent of the mangosteen queen was driving you wild and caused your mouth to water profusely. You were itching to see if she tasted as good as she smelled.
You...
111233122121.title: You climb down and go towards the Tsareena girl

choices: Head into the vast unknown
Think of a way to get across this place
Suddenly, you hear something nearby
112.content:
There were tall grass all around you and-wait wait WAIT!

Grass?!

Why are you surrounded by a bunch of grass? They were much taller than you, making you almost the size of an insect. Is this some kind of dream or is someone trying to play a practical joke on you? You reach out and rub one of the grass blade and shocked to find out that it felt completely real. "This can't be..." you said in disbelief. It seems that you really are tiny as an insect, but how did something like this happen? You just woke up from a goodnight sleep!

You noticed a clearing just a few feet away in front of you; it might be the exit to this "forest". You wanted to find out were you are, but you don't want to risk getting yourself in danger into the great unknown. You could try find another way of getting across safely.
112.title: You are in a large park

choices: You made it to the Floatzel girl
The Floatzel girl gets up and leaves
Another giant Pokemon anthro walks into the middle of your way
1121.content:
"I don't want do risk myself getting hurt in a place like this, but I have to find out were I am at the moment." You said while making your way to the clearing. It's alot better to go there than staying here and get yourself eaten by bugs or something.

You got to the exit and take a peak at the outside world. In front of your eyes, you see an ever expanding road that could probably take days to reach the end of the end of either side. The road itself was bright yellow and it was made out of bricks. At first, you still don't know where you are until you get a closer look and saw towering lamp posts on both your directions and a bench that was far-off in front of you. You thought that you were in the middle of some kind of giant park. Speaking of that bench, you could see someone sitting on it while reading a book.

Being bug-sized, this person was obviously bigger than you so you finally got out of the grass patch and take a look at the giant. You were expecting to see a human-like giant; you did got that right...sort of.

You discovered that the giant was female and has a human-like shape. Instead of what you expect, she looks more like a weasel or sea otter with orange-redish fur. You could of sworn you know a creature like this until you finally got it:

She was a giant anthropomorphic Floatzel!

Right in your very eyes was a 20-something year old Floatzel that has a human-like body rather than an actual Floatzel. She even wears clothes like a person. Her attire includes only a yellow T-shirt, blue jeans, and a pair of white sneakers. You do have one question in your head, is everyone in this world anthropomorphic Pokemon? So far, you only saw one so it's a possibly.

As the Floatzel giantess reads, you go forward towards her. You don't know if she's friendly or not, but you don't want to stay here forever.
1121.title: Head into the vast unknown

choices: You drop down and look around
You decided to hide underneath the sand
Someone is coming here to play
1122.content:
No way, it's best to not go and risk it. Who knows what will happen if you even go out there, you'll probably get yourself hurt back there if there were scary predators lurking around. So the better choice would be to think and find a better path to follow.

You look around to see if you could find something to hide in for the time being. After some searching, you see a shape that was nearly far away. It was squarely-shaped and it looks like a good place to hide in. You make your way towards the mysterious object, pushing away the grass as you go.

After all of that, you made it to the object. It's clearly made out of wooden planks, but you still don't know what it is or how do you get up there. Luckily for you, there are some holes on the wall which you could use as footholds. So with that, you make your way up to see what this giant thing is.

You reach the top of the edge and climb on top of it. Your eyes then spots something you didn't expect to find here. In front of you lies a vast desert that completely covers this object. "What's a desert doing here?" You asked. It almost look like a giant...sandbox?

Something tells you that this world is not as empty as it seems...

What happens next?
1122.title: Sand Kingdom

choices: You dig down and created a hideout
You try to get out of here
You are spotted by the Hatenna girl
11223.content:
As you ponder on what this "desert" even is, a series of sounds can be heard from behind; it's sounded like footsteps hitting the grass. With this sound you're hearing, you finally realized that this world is not some giant empty world. In fact with this giant sandbox you are standing on, this place you are right now is actually some kind of playground. You look behind and expected to see some sort of giant walking towards you. However, you got one right about a giant, but you did not got the person right because this giant does not look anything like a human.

The giant appears to be a little girl about 6 or 7 years old that closely resembles a Hatenna and yet, she is clearly more humanoid than the Pokemon she is based on. In fact, she has pink arms and legs; both of which normal Hatennas lack. She's even wearing a purple dress with white polka dots on it, puffy sleeves, and it's tied by a white ribbon; she's looks very much like a normal child. In both of her hands, she's carrying a plastic shovel and pail making you realized that she is coming here to play on the sandbox.

Of course, you were too focused on this and didn't got a chance to do something. You watch as the Hatenna girl makes a leap to the sandbox; you can see her jumping over you like a missile before landing on the sand. To her, it just a simple splat on the sand but to you, it was a great eruption of sand debris around you that created a small sandstorm. It was even enough to make you fall off the edge and into the sand below. After this, you didn't hesitate and dig deep into the sand to protect yourself from the dust and to avoid getting spotted by the girl.

What happens next?
11223.title: A Giant In The Desert

choices: You're in the middle of a strange forest (On a furry anthro)
You're on the middle of a fleshy landscape (On a furless anthro)

114.content:
Because of the fact that you woke up a little too early, your vision was a completely out of focus. Your bed was quite comfortable so you really want to take a another rest on it. Strangely, your floor was pretty soft too, you don't remember it being this soft. You managed to withstand the drowsiness and rubbed your eyes.

"What the.." you said in mixture of amazement and confusion. You were NOT in your room anymore as a matter of fact, you weren't even in your world anymore!

First thing is that they didn't have any branches and the bark felt somewhat soft. Upon further observation you see the color of the trees are...

11411.content: Looking around in this strange forest, it seems the trees to be either light brown and that some of them to be white. You don't know what it is until you felt the ground shake around you. Holding onto the branch of tree, it appears to be that this land to be moving and that a shadow starts to appear above. "It can't be real, this must be a dream right?" You looked up from your position to see a head of a cute Eevee and that you realized the head of the Eevee looks to be humanoid than a feral pokemon. That can only mean that this pokemon can stand on two legs if it is Anthro pokemon. You tried to remember what part of body are you to this anthro pokemon as it gets up from the bed and starts to yawn really loudly that almost burst your ears. You still hold on tight as it moves...
11411.title: Light brown (Eevee)

choices: You made it upwards without no problem whatsoever
Something happens along the way and you fall off
You got spotted
114112.content:
After witnessing the giant Eevee in front of your eyes, you discovered two things so far:

First was that the giant you were currently on was in fact female as you could see two slowly developing hills that were nearly blocking her face. By the looks of the size of them, this anthro Pokemon appears to be no older than 14 and possibly still young.

And second of all, you were standing on her exposed stomach; it appears that her pajama shirt didn't completely covered her midriff, possibly too tired to further pull down her shirt.

The Eevee girl all sudden got up from her bed, but you managed to hold on to her fur. Unfortunately for you, her shirt quickly drops down as she got up and you got swept by the giant fabric. However, you managed to grab onto the bottom of the shirt as fast as you possibly can. This situation doesn't look so frightening since she's currently sitting on the bed at first. A few seconds later however, she moves herself to the edge of the bed and stood up. Now looking below, you know that this could be your last if you were not careful enough.

You look up to see that this young girl has a tired look; meaning that if she looks down, she'll be too tired too see you. You thought and decided to climb up her shirt to reach her head in order to get her attention. "It's dangerous, but I have no other choice." you said and began your trek upwards.
114112.title: The Tired Giant

choices: You climb to her ear
You fall off into the sink
You fall off onto her tail
1141121.content:
Elizabeth yawned and gets up from her bed to start her day. Yesterday was kinda fun back at her Eloise's house, but too bad the only food they have were just old stale popcorn; if only they have enough money buy some food.

She gets off her bed and makes her way to the bathroom. Little did she knows that a small guy is hanging for his life by her shirt and he's now climbing up to get her attention.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

With all your strength, you climb your way up to this young Eevee girl as much as you can. The soft fabric of her shirt may make things easier but due to your tiny size, you'll be out of breath once you get there.

And just like that, you were panting after you reached the shoulder. While you were catching your breath, you take a look at this young giantess on the bathroom mirror.

You kinda admit, she does look kinda cute especially her drowsy expression. Because of that, she's still unaware of your presence (or maybe because she's still tired too even care of what's standing on her shoulder).

Now that you finally got your breath, you carefully make your way to her neck.

What happens next?
1141121.title: Elizabeth The Eevee

choices: Try to climb the girl again,
Go for her butt..??
Her mom comes in. (She doesn’t see you)
11411213.content:
You are crouched in her fur when you lose footing and fall backwards.. You closed your eyes as you fall but then you fall into something very fluffy..

You open your eyes and you only see brown. You ‘swim’ upwards and then poke out your head was this girls butcheeks! Then it clicked you were in her tail! You go back hiding and you ponder what to do...
11411213.title: You fall off onto her tail

choices: You go to the mother
You stay with Elizabeth
You fall off Elizabeth's tail and onto the floor as they both leave you
114112133.content:
Elizabeth brushed her teeth and then her hair until she's finally done. She hears a knock on the door and a voice is heard.

"Elizabeth dear, are you done?" It was her mother.

"Yea mom, you can come out now." Said Elizabeth.

Her mom comes into the bathroom and sees her daughter all already done with her hair recently.

"I just want to say that you need to get ready right away, because your sister, Jade is getting impatient." Her mother explained.

Elizabeth groans upon hearing this "Doesn't she already know that I'm trying to hurry up as much as I can? I'm not that slow!"

"Well that's what she's saying right now. You do realize it's kinda rude to leave someone waiting for a long time, don't you?" Said her mom "Now please get dressed and start getting ready for school. Your sister needs to drive you there." She then leaves the bathroom.

--------------------------------------------------

You pop out of the Eevee girl's tail when you hear a voice coming from outside the bathroom. After a respond from the giantess, the door opens to reveal another giant Poke-Anthro.

This one was much taller than the one you were on and also very beautiful. She appears to be an anthropomorphic Sylveon who looks to be in her 30s that's dressed in a dark red tight T-shirt, blue jeans tied by a white belt with a silver buckle, and is currently not wearing any shoes.

The two began a small conversation with each other and upon hearing it, you learn that the Sylveon woman is the Eevee girl's mother, the Eevee girl's name is Elizabeth, and she's about to go with her sister named Jade so that she could drive her to school.

You now have two thoughts in your head. You could try to go and get the mother's attention instead. You definitely need a mature adult like her to help you in this strange world. Though you were still closer to Elizabeth and that would be a waste to do so, especially since it would probably be more difficult to get an even bigger giant's attention.

What happens next?
114112133.title: Sylveon Mother

choices: You climb up the mother
You go towards Jade
The mother feels you on her foot
1141121331.content:
Despite the difficulty of getting a bigger giant's attention, you still wanted to go straight for her mom. You don't really know how right now, but you'll have to wait until get there.

Looking at down, you saw a bathroom mat below and wasting no time, you jump off of Elizabeth's tail and landed safety as the soft fibers cushions your fall. As the giant mother and daughter continued to talk, you push through the fibers and got out of the mat; it was time for action.

You ran past between the Eevee girl's towering legs and go straight for her Sylveon mother. It didn't take that very long to get there and thankfully you got to her feet. You look high up to see that she is obviously taller than her daughter so getting her attention is not that easy. Right now, you don't want to waste time climbing her just yet, so you decided to go on top of her foot and stay there for a while.

Doing just that, you approach and climb up her left foot, using her pink fur as support. Once you got there, you found yourself surrounded by similar trees like before, but there're all pink instead. You quickly hold onto one of them in time as the giantess now begans to walk away from the bathroom.

You watch as your ride walks across the hallway, down the stairs, and into the living room. You are very surprised to see that this world is very much like yours.

Resting on the gigantic sofa, you saw another giantess resting on it. This one is much older than the Eevee girl and is about 16 to 17 years old. She appears to be a Jolteon anthro that wears a punkish looking outfit which consented a black sleeveless midriff-baring top with a skull on it, grey pants that's tied by black belt with a grey buckle, and a pair of black boots. You could tell that this must be Jade who is going to bring Elizabeth to school. Right now, she has a slightly annoyed look on her face as she waits for her younger sister.

What happens next?
1141121331.title: Going For The Mom

choices: You manage to climb Jade's body successfully
There was something getting in your way climbing Jade
Jade decided to check on her sister making your climb harder
Jade spots you on her boot while waiting for her sister
Reader's choice
11411213312.content:
"Mom, when is Elizabeth going to come down? I have been waiting for 30 minutes already! We are going to be late again! I can't believe she overslept again. Why come you can't just drive her to school instead of me doing it?" Elizabeth complains as the mother comes by her and give her a hug. "I am sorry Sweetie, but I need to go to work too. I have to run some errands this morning but I am promised I make it up to you though. Don't you worry Sweetie!" She hugs her daughter again and give her a kiss on the forehead. "I am going to go now but I hope you two have fun at school! Don't get in trouble you all." The mother says as she moves away from Jade and gets ready to go on her way to do errands and work. However, Jade was still annoyed no more than less and that she knew her mother always make it up to her somehow. Still she doesn't like to wait for her sister and that she yells at her. "ELIZABETH, When are you coming down? WE are already late as we are, don't make me come up there and start to wrestle you!" She yells at her as the Eevee respond back, "I will be down 10 minutes! I am sorry Jade! I will be coming down soon!" She says still in the bathroom. Jade waits patiently was she is on her phone looking very annoyed about this.

Meanwhile for you, you were still holding onto the mother foot fur and that you can see she is approaching to her lovely daughter that looks really annoyed. You got a good view of Jade up closed now and that you have to say she looks pretty cute when she is annoyed. Maybe you would get her attention instead of the mother. Even consider how nice the mother is and cute but you like girls that are punkish and that maybe you could cheer her up along the way going to her school. You think it might be a best choice yet.

As the mother was just an arm reach from Jade, you made climb off from her paws, landed on the carpet again safely and made your way towards the Jolteon. It took fives minutes off your time and lucky they were talking while you were making your adventure to Jade. Their booming voices was loud to your ears but you manage plug it with your fingers. Once you got to Jade boot, you trying to decide on how to climb since it a rubber boot and that looking up, you see Jade getting hug from her mother before her foot paw slammed to the ground making you jump up high into the air until you landed on top of the boot. After that, the mother left the scene before you heard her footsteps stomping away the scene. As you were getting up, trying to find what happened, you then heard a voice so loud that you thought you were going deaf. It was Jade yelling to her sister when she is coming down and threaten her if she doesn't come at all. It nearly pop off at your ears but lucky it subdued. So you got up again, to see where you are and according to you, that you were on the boot in the middle to be exact and that you can see her looming form as she then got on her phone and start texting away. It seems it was a perfect time to climb before her sister comes down to go to school. So you make your way to the leg and you were climbing to punkish Jade.

What happens next?
11411213312.title: You go towards Jade

choices: Stay on the paw
Try to escape
114113.content:
Looking around from where you were, you notice something to your right that was massively huge, black and kinda curved. It seemed to resemble some sort of claw. Looking back on the Eevee, you are able to see nearly the entire body but mostly the legs from your perspective. You come to realize that you are on the paw of this anthro. Studying the Eevee more, you are aware that this is some type of female because of the hills on its chest but also a rather young 14 year old teenager. The wind around you starts to pick up speed very quickly as the Eevee seems to start moving it’s legs to the edge of the bed. As you hang on to dear life, you hope that since you are on the paw of this creature that you won’t get crushed by the simple act of her just casually standing up. Since you are about the size of a speck, she probably wouldn’t notice.

Luckily, when you heard a huge thump of her placing her feet on the ground, you notice that you are on the top of your paw. Just when you believe that little motion from the bed to the ground was crazy, she started to walk around her house which made hanging on to her hair strand much more challenging. After what seems like an hour of hanging on, the moving around stopped. You take a moment look at your surroundings and find out you are in a bathroom of sorts. It seems like she is following the normal morning routine of hers, but since noises were amplified because of your size, you were able to hear everything she was doing from washing her hands to her combing her hair. She was taking quite a while when you thought about it. You were thinking that you could take the time to escape from where you were to another place that didn’t move around so much. But you also thought that during your escape, you could get easily get hurt or stepped on by this Eevee or any other large creature and perhaps the safest thing to do right now is just stay on the anthros paw and perhaps travel up to a safer part of her body.

Trying to ignore it keep scaling but then you relize looking back you seem to be in a giant bedroom! No. You had to learn about them. Learn what they do their personality’s you just don’t want them squash you instantly! So you hide in her clevage falling asleep to the comfort.

About an hour later you wake up to a rumble and the world moving.. You are to scared to move as you may stimulate her or even worse be noticed in her boobs..

But you look up to the head of a humanoid Latias and looked very tired you hear draws opening most likely putting clothes on. Namely one of them being her bra which made your world dark.. There goes the idea of going forward to look out.

12.content: After a long goodnight sleep, you finally woken up from your slumber and opened your eyes. After you opened them, you expected to see your room, but however, you found yourself in an unfamiliar area that you never seen before.
12.title: Female

info.brief_description: You are stranded in the middle of a dimension full of giant anthropomorphic Pokemon!
info.description:
This is pretty much your average interactive story about a tiny human trapped in a world of giant anthro Pokemon. However unlike most of the ones you see around here, this one more about surviving inside the world and similar to those type of stories involving a nearly micro-sized protagonist in an unaware world.

Anyways, you're a human who woked up inside the world for unknown reasons and try to survive getting squished or eaten. Because of your tiny size, you are almost impossible to be seen or heard by the Pokeanthros.

Rules:

1. Any type of fetish is allowed as long they're also focus on Marco/Micro stuff.

2. The story is mostly unaware, but aware scenarios are allowed too as long as there's a detailed reason why the character got noticed.

3. No humans except for you or feral Pokemon.

4. The chapter must have at least a paragraph unless it's a choice chapter and try to put some effort into it as well.

5. Use a decent grammar.

6. Your personality varies in this story. That way, anyone can choose what fits right for their character.

7. You can end the story, but don't try to do so with only a few chapter.

8. Deaths are allowed as long as the chapter is detailed enough.

9. Any ages of the Pokemon depends on the evolution forms:

First Stage: 0-9

Second Stage: 9-17

Third Stage: 17-Onwards

A pokemon with two evolution forms will have this kind:

First Stage: 0-14

Second Stage: 14-Onwards

A Pokemon with no evolution will stay in that form, obviously.

10. Have fun.




06/21/2019 UPDATE:

As of this time, the story's rating has now jumped from 13+ to 18+ giving everyone the freedom to write whatever fits their style whatever they want. Any chapters with violent, sexual or other contents that are common in older rated stories are accepted without consequences.

However, there's still a few limits that you must follow. Just because you can write whatever you want does not mean there's no rules.

New Rules:

1. No extreme sexual content with underage characters.

It's so damn obvious why stuff like this should never be in the story. I don't want to see a story involving NSFW material with young characters because it's seriously messed up. So please don't go too far with this sort of stuff with the chapter involve around them.

2. No rebirthing.

I can still tolerate Insertion stuff....even if that's not my cup of tea. However, I can't really make sense with rebirthing stuff (I mean how can't you be turn into a newborn just by going inside reproductive organs) so I'm afraid this sort of stuff aren't allowed. My apologizes to all you fans out there.

3. Toilet stuff

While I'm fine with some bodily functions like sweat, boogers, and so on. However, I'm not okay with pooping, peeing and other stuff that is commonly seen on the toilet. Seriously, I'm terribly grossed out by this sort of stuff. Of course, that doesn't mean everyone can't do their business as long it happens off-screen.


So there you have it guys, go extra nuts and write what's ever in your mind ;)
